Debrief.Wrappers

Class TrackWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.PlainWrapper
      • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.LightweightTrackWrapper
        • Debrief.Wrappers.TrackWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISecondaryTrack, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, ColoredWatchable, WatchableList, CanEnumerate, DynamicPlottable, Editable, Exportable, HasEditables, HasEditables.ProvidesContiguousElements, Layer, Plottable, Renamable, DraggableItem, HasDraggableComponents, SupportsPropertyListeners, RightClickCutCopyAdaptor.IsTransientForChildren
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeTrackWrapper

    public class TrackWrapper
extends LightweightTrackWrapper
implements WatchableList, DraggableItem, HasDraggableComponents, HasEditables.ProvidesContiguousElements, ISecondaryTrack, DynamicPlottable
    the TrackWrapper maintains the GUI and data attributes of the whole track iteself, but the responsibility for the fixes within the track are demoted to the FixWrapper
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
